backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI features and associated files for the radiology app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text map of frontend file paths to short summaries for reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS setup defining color tokens, theming variables, and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all major pages and wraps them in AppShell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper rendering TopNav, page content via Outlet, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright text, heart icon, and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with logo, desktop links, and a mobile collapsible menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMockChat.ts: Implements a mock chat hook that stores messages, simulates typing, and returns random preset responses. Provides sendMessage, message state, and typing status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks with no current implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus utility classes and global base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AIExplanationPage.tsx: Renders an explanation page detailing what the AI model detected and why it reached its conclusion, using styled informational sections.
frontend/src/pages/ChatbotPage.tsx: Displays a chat interface using the mock chat hook with message history, input handling, and suggested prompts.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page with hero section, image, and step-by-step overview of how the AI radiology workflow operates.
frontend/src/pages/ImageUploadPage.tsx: Provides an image upload form with drag‑and‑drop, preview, study metadata input, and simulated analysis workflow.
frontend/src/pages/ReportHistoryPage.tsx: Displays a filterable list of mock reports with search, modality, and status filters, and navigates to the result page on selection.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Shows analysis results or a loading state based on processing status, using either the current study or a selected historical report.
frontend/src/state/mockReports.ts: Defines the MockReport interface and provides a list of static sample radiology report objects.
frontend/src/state/mockStudyState.ts: Creates a Zustand store for managing current study data, processing state, and selected reports.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, shadows, typography, animations, and container settings for the app’s medical UI theme.
project_state.json: Stores high-level project metadata, requirements, UI goals, and existing feature definitions for the AI Radiology Assistant frontend.
